Username_already_: Such username already exists. Please try again!
Username_self_send_: You can't send it to yourself
Try_again_: Internal error, please try again later
Username_min_length_: Please, enter the display name with min. 5 characters
Username_max_length_: Please, enter the display name with max. 256 characters
Username_incorrect_format_: Please, just letters, digits and special characters like '-', '.' and '_' are allowed
Password_incorrect_format_: - It must include at least one upper and one lower case letters; - It must include a digit (0123456789) and a special character (!@#$%^&*_+=).
Wrong_code_length_: Please, enter the code with min. 5 characters
Password_min_: Wachtwoord must have a minimum 8 characters
Entered_login_password_is_incorrect: Entered login and/or password is incorrect.
Please_check_and_try_one_more_time: Please check and try one more time.
Birthday_incorrect_: You must be at least 18 years
Email_already_: Such email is already occupied! Please use the password recovery form or enter a different email.
No_such_email_: No such email. Please check and try one more time.
